paragraphs: At the Kino Lucerna cinema, located in the very center of Prague, there will be a screening of the movie "Northern Wind". Right after the credits, the audience will have the opportunity to ask their questions to Renata Litvinova, who directed the film and played one of the main roles in it.
The discussion will be moderated by journalist Maxim Kurnikov.
🕖 The show will take place on October 13, 2025 (Monday) at 7:00 PM.
👉 Tickets can be purchased through this link.

In addition to the standard ticket, there is also a Meet & Greet ticket available, which allows you to participate in an informal meeting with Renata Litvinova and other guests after the show (drinks and light snacks are included in the price).

"The Northern Wind" is a magical drama set in a fictional time of a great matriarchy, where women of a powerful clan ruled the Northern Fields. Their desires were fulfilled, and love remained the most cherished miracle. But one day, harmony collapsed, and the world plunged into chaos.
🎵 The music for the movie was written by Zemfira Ramazanova.
The movie starred Nikita Kukushkin, Manana Totibadze, Maxim Sukhanov, Svetlana Khodchenkova, and others.
